sentences.sContent: facilities to ensure the safety of cyclists
sentences.sCn: 确保骑车人安全的设施

sentences.sContent: ...Normal forgetting may even be a safety mechanism to ensure our brain doesn’t become too full...

...finds that the best way to ensure employees are “engaged” is to give them more control over where and how they do their work―which may mean liberating them from having to do everything in collaboration with others...
...maintaining a formal distance between teachers and students can ensure an atmosphere of authority in the classroom and avoid both real and perceived bias...
...the article says innovative ideas alone do not ensure success...
...Responsibilities generally include supervising study spaces to ensure that a quiet atmosphere is maintained...
...Department of Education is making efforts to ensure that all students have equal access to a quality education...
...educators have to ensure that children want to learn...
...one way to ensure your success is to be a great listener...
...it is more important than ever to ensure their survival...
...so the government needs to ensure that institutions have all the support they need to attract international students who make a tremendous academic...
...In order to ensure him to attend the meeting88...
...so as to ensure that “green campus” can work smoothly with the co-effort of the whole society...

exam.question: The Car Club couldn’t ________ to meet the demands of all its members.

answer.explain: 句意： 汽车俱乐部不能保证满足其所有成员的需要。assume： 假设， 假定， 臆断； guarantee： 担保， 确保， 保证； confirm： 证实， 肯定； 批准。

remMethod.val: en(使…) ＋ sure(确定的) → 使确定 → 保证

trans.tranOther: to make certain that something will happen properly
